head.title: Kari & Cody | Dana Marino Design
head.description: Black, gold, and ivory art-deco inspired invitation suite and 'day of' stationery for Kari and Cody's glamorous wedding in Sarasota, Florida.

body.name: Kari & Cody
body.description: Invitation suite and 'day of' stationery for Kari and Cody's glamorous wedding in Sarasota, Florida. Customized lettering and deco-inspired graphics bring a touch of the 20's to this modern, elegant event. Featured on Style Me Pretty and Carats and Cake.
